item.title: Create Static Blog With Hugo and Github Pages in 5 Minutes
item.description: Todo [x] Download hugo releases for windows 10 https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ Extract and copy hugo.exe to your HUGO_PATH Add your HUGO_PATH to environment path. Window Icon + ‘env’ => Edit System Variables Eg: C:/softwares/hugo Open system environment variable Add new hugo path Add hugo path to path Test hugo --help [x] Create new hugo site hugo new site blog.jsguru.net --force [x] Setup gh-pages for hugo https://github.com/marketplace/actions/hugo-setup .github\workflows\gh-pages.yml name: GitHub Pages on: push: branches: - main # Set a branch to deploy pull_request: jobs: deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-20.
